theorem putnam_1972_a5
(n : ℕ)
(hn : n > 1)
: ¬((n : ℤ) ∣ 2^n - 1) := by
  norm_num
  intro h
  have h₁ : (2 : ℤ) ^ n ≥ n + 1 := by
    norm_cast
    have h₂ : n + 1 ≤ 2 ^ n := by
      exact Nat.succ_le_of_lt (Nat.lt_pow_self (by norm_num) n)
    linarith
  have h₂ : (n : ℤ) ∣ 2 ^ n - 1 := h
  have h₃ : (2 : ℤ) ^ n - 1 ≥ n := by
    have h₄ : (2 : ℤ) ^ n ≥ n + 1 := h₁
    omega
  have h₄ : (n : ℤ) ∣ 2 ^ n - 1 := h₂
  have h₅ : (n : ℤ) ≤ 2 ^ n - 1 := by
    have h₆ : (n : ℤ) ∣ 2 ^ n - 1 := h₄
    have h₇ : (n : ℤ) ≤ 2 ^ n - 1 := by
      exact Int.le_of_dvd (by
        have h₈ : (2 : ℤ) ^ n - 1 > 0 := by
